Text:
Thanks bud for the great cult films u upload. But in the future could u be so kind and also name the movies/ups with the same name as ur folder (Ninjutsu1....2....3 and so forth) Makes it much easier for me to keep track of what I have or don't.

Again, thanks for the superb ups!!

Polifem, is it possible to reseed Nijushi no Hitomi?
